features.description: Create and manage comprehensive offers with service, product, or sale-level discounts that can be applied during checkout
capabilities: Create offers with custom names and descriptions
Set offer validity periods and date restrictions
Permission-based offer creation (Admin or Can manage offers permission)
user_benefits: Better client retention through targeted offers

features.description: Apply offers through staff manual selection, client offer codes, or automatic application based on conditions
capabilities: Offer code entry in online booking
Automatic application based on offer settings

features.description: Target specific client segments and conditions with sophisticated offer rules and restrictions
Support for service discounts, product discounts, and entire sale discounts with flexible configuration options
Configure staff commission calculations based on regular price or discounted price for offer transactions
Automatically apply the best available discount when multiple offers are eligible for the same transaction
View detailed information about applied offers during checkout and transaction processing
Track and analyze offer usage, performance, and financial impact through detailed reporting
capabilities: Offers Usage Report with sale details
Offers Summary Report with usage statistics

steps: Open Offers app and select Create Offer
Configure Details tab with application method and restrictions
Set up Discounts tab with specific discount types and amounts
Configure Advanced tab for locations and commission settings
Enable the offer to make it active

key_workflows.workflow_name: Client Uses Offer Code in Online Booking
steps: Client enters offer code in Promo code field during online booking
System validates and saves offer with appointment
During checkout, offer is applied automatically
Discount is reflected in final payment amount
System applies discount and shows details
Generate Offers Usage or Summary report
Review usage statistics and discount amounts
Analyze client behavior and campaign effectiveness
Adjust offer strategy based on insights

integrations.purpose: Enable exclusive offers for members with active memberships

integrations.name: Reports and Analytics
integrations.purpose: Provide detailed tracking and analysis of offer usage and performance

competitive_advantages: Sophisticated offer targeting with multiple restriction types (new clients, membership, minimum amounts)
Intelligent offer optimization that automatically applies the best available discount
Comprehensive discount types including service, product, and entire sale discounts
Flexible commission management allowing choice between regular and discounted price calculations
Seamless integration between online booking and in-store checkout for offer code usage
Advanced reporting capabilities for detailed offer performance analysis
Multi-location offer management with location-specific configurations
Support for complex promotional strategies with multiple discount combinations
